title: Correction to: H2O2-dependent oxidation of the transcription factor GmNTL1 promotes salt tolerance in soybean
content: This is a correction to: Wenxiao Zhang, Wenjiao Zhi, Hong Qiao, Jingjing Huang, Shuo Li, Qing Lu, Nan Wang, Qiang Li, Qian Zhou, Jiaqi Sun, Yuting Bai, Xiaojian Zheng, Mingyi Bai, Frank Van Breusegem, Fengning Xiang, H2O2-dependent oxidation of the transcription factor GmNTL1 promotes salt tolerance in soybean, The Plant Cell, Volume 36, Issue 1, January 2024, Pages 112â€“135, https://doi.org/10.1093/plcell/koad250
